I'll try to keep this quick and to the point. There are many DLCs coming out that require additional money. I'm all about new things, new characters, etc. But they have created a revolving door. 1) new DLC comes out. 2) killers are overpowered (OP) and ruin the experience for everyone (sincerely, every comment is negative in the lobbies)  3) bad reviews come out, devs try to 'dumb down' the characters. Eventually making it moderately playable for those that don't pay $20 per minor download. 4) repeat from step 1. (Occasional step 5, make a "special discount" to get people to think this is a well thought out game.) 

It's truly sad. This game came out with a great gameplay and idea, but it seems there is NO QA testing at all on this game. You will lose your status/rank from one day to the next. Aspects of the game don't work, there are glitches galore. The servers can't handle capacity, they will time out and you will lose perks and tools.

Bluntly, I love this game...and hate this game...it's a blast to play, when you're paired up with a killer/survivor team that is comparable in skills/abilities. But the devs don't actually seem to care about how the experience is, just about how much money they can make from these download packs that don't do any more than give you an OP killer and a mediocre survivor. I truly hope this game can go back to its roots and realize that people play this for fun, not to dominate others based on how much money they are willing to spend. If you have $100+ to spend on this game over the next 3 months, by all means, dive in. If you want to enjoy a competitive landscape, look elsewhere until these bugs and OP characters are remedied.

Sehr schade!

Außerdem wird neuer Content rausgebracht, obwohl es zig bekannte Bugs gibt :/ würde mir da mehr Support wünschen.

Dead by Daylight - это когда в команде 4 человека, но каждый сам за себя
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты помогаешь союзнику выбраться из капкана, а в итоге маньяк ловит тебя и вешает на крюк вместо него
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты умираешь на крюке, а союзники в это время ремонтируют генераторы
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты ремонтируешь последний генератор, а союзник, убегающий от маньяка, приводит его прямо к тебе, и маньяк бежит уже не за ним, а за тобой
Dead by Daylight - это когда твое сердцебиение повышается одновременно с сердцебиением персонажа
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты с оружием идешь убивать хейтеров (которых у тебя нет на YouTube, но ты прекрасно воображаешь их в лице игроков)
Dead by Daylight - это когда от маньяка можно убежать делая безумные петли по дороге
Dead by Daylight - это когда бегущий прямо - рак, нуб, новичок
Dead by Daylight - это когда маньяку необходим двойник, которого нет, ибо ворот для успешного побега двое
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты следишь, чтобы жертву не сняли с крюка, а люди этим временем чинят все генераторы и бегут к воротам
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты отошел от крюка с жертвой на 10 метров, а ей в это время помогли сбежать
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты играешь в прятки по-взрослому
Dead by Daylight - это когда поиграть с друзьями можно только в приватном лобби
Dead by Daylight - это когда тебе наконец-то пригодились школьные знания английского языка
Dead by Daylight - это когда Dead by Daylight выходит раньше, чем "Friday the 13th: The Game"
Dead by Daylight - это когда фанаты Outlast испытывают оргазм
Dead by Daylight - это когда нет надоевшего всем раннего доступа
Dead by Daylight - это когда ты покупаешь готовый продукт, полностью оправдывающий свою цену

The game definitely builds up a level of suspense.. but the main mechanic to achieve this is to make you feel weak and limited - both as a survivor and a killer.

Killers are not all powerfull. Attacking is awkward at best.
Survivors can't fight back in any effective way.

The worst part of this game is the 4:1 player ratio that leaves survivors waiting longer periods in the game lobby - reading reviews, this has been a problem for the past 6 months (apologies, I thought I had read posts about this from early 2015 and earlier said "2 years").

After the first session, I was not keen to play a second.  I reluctantly tried it again twice and my verdict did not change.

The game is pretty fun, if plagued with a few nasty glitches such as matches never loading, but it has a really ugly flaw that stands out over all other. The grind is OBSCENE. I'm talking F2P Korean MMO levels of grind. It can easily take 70+ hours of play to max level just one of the 10 characters, and each character can reset their level up to three time to unlock cosmetics and in game bonuses. Vets have a massive advantage over new players due to the fact that they have far more hours and thus more things unlocked.

The community is also somewhat unplesant, especially when you play as Killer against a group of friends. Not only will they often cheat with voice comms (something not naturally available within the game itself), but they also tend to rage at the end of the game if you don't allow them to rescue their friend from the hook.
Es un gran juegazo, tanto pa jugar solo, o con colegas. A pesar de tener varios bugs (que espero que arreglen) pillarlo de oferta por 13 euros merece mucho la pena.

this game was bad at first because the quality was set too high and my game started laggin ALOT! then i turned the qaulity down to low and now it runs perfectly! now i play this game all day evryday. well as much as i can at least.

Pay to win garbage. Dont have most if not all of the DLC's? You are at a disadvantage. A serious one at that. AVOID THIS TRASH AT ALL COSTS. I mean that.

Nearly 340k reviews and out of those nearly 90k (roughly 1/3) are bad but the game maintains a very positive rating? How is that possible?

The slightest dissent of this game in the steam forums will result in a ban. They bring out the ban hammer on a regular basis to stifle criticism. Seen hundreds of people banned. I am one of them.

There are more reasons not to play this then are reasons to play this. Just read the negatives

44 playable characters in the game. 70 million odd bloodpoints needed to get all characters to level 50. You will earn on average 15-25k BP per game that will last anywhere from 5 min to 30 min. How long do you think it will take you to earn the 70 million needed?

6 million copies sold with only 40k playing at peak. This game is a revolving door where lots of people leave, once they figure out the imbalance, the MMO grind to get BP and see the bugs. Then new players take over their spots.

MMR system was promised 2 years ago now. Since then they have released a stream of DLC characters and ignore any comments about the implementation of their MMR system. I think they have released 4 chapters now, or more, since the promise of MMR. What are their priorities? Sales, not decent gameplay.

Playing well and killing survivors too quickly WILL result in your rank going down. You are not allowed to kill them quickly if you want to rank up. You are supposed to "play" with them and give them chances. 

Trouble with that is that at high rank you dont even get that many chances to throw people on the meathook. So the actual playing of the game is counter to what the requirements are to rank up. Its a bad system. 

On top of that the rift challenges open games up to all sorts of sillyness. People start off the game with the rift challenge in mind and not to get out. So they wont do gens needed to open the door as the challenge demands that they do 3 pallet slams with X character to get the reward. And this is game after game after game you get this crap. Solo player experience in this game is bad. All you do is die over and voer again while getting out maybe 1 in 10. If the others dont farm you first.

Hackers are all over this game. Same with cheaters that use voice coms in a game where you are not meant to use it. Teleportation hacks. Invincibility hacks.Does not stop them though as the easy anti cheat does not catch it.

Solo player? Good luck. They buffed the killers to be able to deal with a 4 person crew using coms so solo que people get the shaft. Time and time again.

Avoid this garbage at all costs. To even be able to be semi competitive you will NEED all DLC perks unless you are able to predict with %90 accuracy how people will react and move around the map. Have the 75 pounds, dollars, yen spare on top of the price of the game itself for all the DLC?

Devs are incapable of balancing this game. Devs are incapable of fixing bugs that are left in and then called a feature later on.

Bugs are plenty. Sound bugs. Cant hear people you have slugged when they dont have a noise suppression perk. Cant heal people as the prompt wont show up. Characters get stuck on environmental objects. Perks randomly just dont work. Perks you dont even have equpped are granted to you. Aura's of players are shown with no perks. Sound bugs. Killer bugs are left to rot and stay put for years. But god forbid one of the most used surv perks gets bugged and made unusable. That will get fixed in a week.

At every step of the game you will face frustration. In your first game as surv they will pit you against a fully perked killer with 1000's of hours. As killer you will face fully perked surv's also with 1000's of hours that will run circles around you. This is intentional. Dev's have stated that they want you to feel frustrated and powerless. Dont like it? The dev's recommend you play something else. So do i.

There is practically nothing the killer can do when facing a 4 person voice com using squad that is halfway competent. Voice coms gives them so much info on where the killer is and what is he doing the other 3 can work on their objectives half asleep while holding mouse 1 button on a generator. Since you need to hook a person three times to kill them that means 3 chases and 3 hooks. They will just trade people on the hooks so you will get the hooks but never enough on one person to get the kill. This is how you can lose the game. 

Survs have far too many second chance perks and things to waste your time. As killer you will spend most of your games literally running in circles around pallets and objects in the game. In circles my friends. Round and round. Sound like fun?

Just avoid this garbage. Seriously. Dont get the game thinking you are going to be a badass killer. You are not. And killers are mostly there to provide survs with points the higher you go in rank.

Dont even think that this game is a hide and seek game either. That was 4 years ago. Since then they removed all ability to hide and intrduced tons of perks that give away your position. This is a running in circles sim.

I only pop in now and then to see what this garbage has turned into. I have better things to play that are not bad for your health in terms of stress
Super Spiel aber doch sehr verbuggt (noch)

Amazing game! I recommend this to anyone that wanna have a great time with da boys! DLC for this game is pretty cool but pricey. The only downside I have about this game is that its buggy. It would be great if they fix some of the bugs because they're a major issue to me and my friends. Some problems that im having are when I get placed in a game but get an endless loading screen and the only thing you have to do is end the game through task manager.. 

I also have a cool addon idea for this game. 
The killer can be Chucky, he would have a low camera height like The Hag. 
His weapon would be a standard knife. 
Outfits could be the original one from childs play 1 without any scars&stiches and his second outfit could be one with all the stiches and marks on his clothes.
Special could be that when you press the RMB he lays down on the ground and goes invisible and whenever a survivor gets near him he can gab onto their leg and stabs them to knock them down on the ground. or another one could be that whenever a survivor is in a 7m range of him and Chucky see's him, it sends Chucky into frenzy and he chases the killer screaming and giving him a slight speed boost making his screen go red.
I have no idea on perks as of yet.

Overall I rate this game 9/10 and I think it deserves Steam GOTY!!

Fix the lag and add dedicated servers

You know, this game is extremely fun, except for one thing.  Games are hosted P2P.  This is 2016 soon to be 2017.  So few games run P2P anymore with very good reason.  A host that is not a server, can control the connections coming in and out of their machine.  There have been MANY times that i have been disconnected from a host but my 3 buddies are still in the game.  Add on top of that loosing rare offerings that offer 75% blood points and me getting booted out and getting a whole 3,000 bloodpoints is utter rediculous.  This game should be server hosted.  Server rentals are not that expensive and I can guarantee they have made PLENTY of money off of this game so far.  Why not have servers setup for proper hosting and to allow EVERYONE who plays this game the ability to enjoy it with or without their friends and without the worry of being the only one disconnected and loosing valuable offerings.
i think for a 4v1 this game is pretty fun and exciting!

1. Das Spiel  an sich ist grade eins meiner favorieten (Positiv)

2.Auch nach so vielen Updates ist das Game iimmernoch Buggy.

   Teilweise nicht hin bekommt in eine Lobby zu gelangen und anstatt das immer nur den warte Bildschirm anzeigt.  ect.

3.Das Spiel ist zwar nicht " Pay to win" aber es ist schon so das man für jeden kleinen Popel eins der DCL´s kaufen soll. 
   Seih es neue Klamotten für die Charakter ,die so wie so sehr wenig sind, oder die Neuen Killer ,bla bla bla ....      
   (Negativ)

4.Die neuen Killer die es gibt sind von DLC zu DLC immer over power ,was ich nicht verstehen kann ... Sprich da kommt   
   das Tehma wieder zurück von "Pay to win" dar es anscheinend mit jedem Killer leichter wird.           (negativ)
  
5.Das neue Bewertungs System ist ganz gut abe ich verstehe den Sinn dahinter noch nicht ganz    (halb / halb)

6.Ich kann verstehen wenn man zu einem Spiel ein DLC raus haut ,aber so viele? Für so viel Geöld auch noch? Danke aber  
   nein Danke ....        (Negativ) 

7. Ich will garnicht weiter über die Sachen schreiben die mich aufregen (auch wenn es momentan viele sind).
    An sich ist es ein richtig gutes Game (wenn man zum Spielen kommt) mit gut entwickelten Perks, Opfergaben und so  
    weter ,außerdem macht es riesigen Spaß ,voralledem wenn man es mit anderen leuten im Teamspeak spielt ABER 
    es legen mir ein paar offentsichtliche Probleme dar die mich mitunter sehr aufregen und das eigendlich wunderbare    
    Spiel mir echt Madieg macht.

游戏很好玩，原本作为一个萌新，特别喜欢玩偷电贼（逃生者），被农场主（屠夫）完虐，现在作为一个资深逃生者，我已经能淡然面对屠夫，被带着他绕圈。原本我这萌新屠夫一个都打不死，现在也能干掉三人，你说还有一个人咋了？被我放到地窖去了，杀人太多违背佛家思想》V《。DLC的不断推出，也使得这款游戏不断注入活力。制作组也很诚信。

bug太多，强烈不推荐，垃圾游戏

El sistema de emparejamientos es lo más injusto desde que existe la Copa del Rey en España.
El juego necesita un pepino incluso a calidad mínima y eso no quita que haya lag.
Algunas interacciones ni siquiera salen cuando las accionas.
El sistema de campeo hace el juego cada vez más pobre.

Aún así, el juego es apasionante pero estas fallas hace que no lo recomiende a nadie hasta que la solventen.
Игры в балансе нет, всё заточено под маньяка. Вечно виснит и лагает.
